name: Bubble Buzz: Win Real Cash
description:
Bubble Buzz! A classic skill-based bubble shooter game that wins you real cash and prizes! Experience a different kind of bubble shooter with a variety of power-ups and get high scores for realmoney!

Download for free to compete in multiplayer tournaments and win REAL CASH and prizes! We're committed to providing a fair and secure social competition gaming platform for our players.

How to Play:
1. Tap to shoot. Clear bubbles by matching 3 or more of the same color. Aim to clear more bubbles at once.
2. Lots of power-ups: Use unique power-ups to clear bubbles faster and earn more points.
3. The faster you clear bubbles, the higher the score!

EXPLORE FUN FEATURES
Play Free Games, Win Real Cash!
-Use Diamonds to play free matches or participate in cash games to win realmoney. Earn free gifts every day by logging in and participating in various in-game events!

Play Against Real Players of Similar Skill Level
-Match with real players of your skill level to play a classic, fun and fair bubble game!

Join Tournaments with Exciting Match Modes
-Play in tournaments with different match modes. The higher you rank, the bigger the prize! Practice for free before playing cash games, then choose from a variety of prize pools to win REAL CASH and prizes!

Safe and Secure Withdrawals
-It's safe and easy to withdraw your winnings with PayPal. We also work with other trusted partners including Apple Pay, Visa, Mastercard, American Express, and Venmo to make the deposit and withdrawal process secure, smooth, and worry-free.

Win Extra Cash with Minigames
-Win extra rewards and realmoney through our classic minigames like Lucky Box and other fun features!

Ad-Free
-A truly immersive gaming experience with no ads to interrupt your gameplay!

* Cash games are not available in the following states: AZ, AR, CT, DE, LA, MT, SC, SD, TN, VT. However, players in these states can still enjoy the fun with free games!
* Players must be at least 18 years of age. In some jurisdictions where Cash games are not available, players can compete in our free games. See our Terms of Service for more information.

Ready to join Bubble Buzz?! Download now and get high scores shooting bubbles! If you have questions and concerns, please contact: support@aviagames.com
